  18. open Ocamltest_stdlib

  20. ‌let srcdir =
  21.   Sys.getenv_with_default_value "OCAMLSRCDIR" Ocamltest_config.ocamlsrcdir

  23. ‌let stdlib =
  24.   Filename.make_path [srcdir; "stdlib"]

  26. ‌let libunix =
  27.   Filename.make_path [srcdir; "otherlibs"; "unix"]
